entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
